item.title: Traefik Pipeline Consolidation
item.description: Introduction It had been decided in our organisation that we would migrate our repositories from a self-hosted gitlab instance to a SaaS solution on Gitlab.com. There are a number of benefits to this but mainly you are saving time spent mangaging it. Having a self hosted instance can have some benefits mostly to do with customisation which (K24).
